short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The game Bubble Mover need to reduce the number of bubbles to their complete disappearance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The game «Bubble Mover» need to reduce the number of bubbles to their complete disappearance. To do this, click on groups of two or more balls of the same color. The game will be over, when on the field there will be no ball, or when there will be more opportunities to continue.
